Package project.DAO

Class CustomerDAO

java.lang.Object
project.DAO.CustomerDAO
public class CustomerDAO extends Object
Handles the database interactions for Customer objects.
Author:
Teksong Eap

  • Method Details

    • getUnusedCustomerId

      public static int getUnusedCustomerId() throws SQLException
      Retrieves an unused customer ID from the database. This is the highest current ID plus one.
      Returns:
      an unused customer ID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • addCustomerToDB

      public static boolean addCustomerToDB(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Adds a new customer to the database. The method sets up a SQL PreparedStatement to execute the INSERT operation, and sets the parameters of the PreparedStatement using the provided Customer object's data. The method then executes the SQL statement and checks the returned row count to determine whether the operation was successful.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer to add to the database
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful; false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • updateCustomerInDB

      public static boolean updateCustomerInDB(Customer customer) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing customer in the database. The method sets up a SQL PreparedStatement to execute the UPDATE operation, and sets the parameters of the PreparedStatement using the provided Customer object's data. The method then executes the SQL statement and checks the returned row count to determine whether the operation was successful.
      Parameters:
      customer - the customer with updated information
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful; false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs

    • getAllCustomers

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getAllCustomers()
      Retrieves all customers from the database.
      Returns:
      an ObservableList containing all customers in the database

    • getCustomersByCountry

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Customer> getCustomersByCountry(int selectedCountryId)
      Retrieves all customers associated with a given country ID from the database.
      Parameters:
      selectedCountryId - the ID of the country whose customers are to be retrieved
      Returns:
      an ObservableList containing all customers for the selected country in the database

    • deleteCustomerFromDB

      public static boolean deleteCustomerFromDB(int selectedCustomerId) throws SQLException
      Deletes a customer from the database. Returns boolean of rowsAffected > 0, 0 being false and anything above true.
      Parameters:
      selectedCustomerId - the ID of the customer to delete
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful; false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
